In a quiet meadow, a curious bunny named Thistle discovered a shimmering pocket watch half-buried in the soil. When she pressed the button, a swirl of colors enveloped her, and she found herself in ancient Egypt, hopping alongside pharaohs. Thistle helped a young scribe find his lost scrolls, earning a golden carrot as a reward. With another press of the watch, she leaped to the future, where bunnies roamed cities filled with towering carrots. Thistle realized that time was just a series of adventures waiting to be explored, and with each leap, she made friends across eras, sharing her tales of bravery.
